metadata.title: CVE-2023-52805 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:jfs: fix array-index-out-of-bounds in diAllocCurrently there is not check against the agno of the iag whileallocating new inodes to avoid fragmentation problem. Added the checkwhich is required.

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
